name: 3 SQ. MILES</br>Irish Island Gin (700ml)
description: Try our multiple-award winning 3 SQ. MILES gin - available here and shipped directly to your door (in Ireland). Ship as many as six bottles for just €8!

name: 3 SQ. MILES</br>Cask-Aged Gin (700ml)
description: We've taken our award-winning gin and aged it wooden casks by the sea to create this exceptional and unique product. Perfect in a martini or adding incredible depth to your Negroni cocktail, this cask-aged gin is sure to please.
